SystemTable.name: schemata
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists `schemata` ( `id` bigint unsigned not null auto_increment, `catalog_name` varchar(512) default 'def', `schema_name` varchar(64) not null, `default_character_set_name` varchar(32) not null, `default_collation_name` varchar(32) not null, `sql_path` varchar(512) default null, `default_db_index` varchar(256) not null, `gmt_created` timestamp not null default current_timestamp, `gmt_modified` timestamp not null default current_timestamp on update current_timestamp, primary key (`id`), unique key (`schema_name`) ) charset=utf8

SystemTable.name: tables
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists `tables` ( `id` bigint unsigned not null auto_increment, `table_catalog` varchar(512) default 'def', `table_schema` varchar(64) not null, `table_name` varchar(64) not null, `new_table_name` varchar(64) default null, `table_type` varchar(64) default 'BASE TABLE', `engine` varchar(64) default 'InnoDB', `version` bigint unsigned not null default '1', `row_format` varchar(10) default 'Dynamic', `table_rows` bigint unsigned default '0', `avg_row_length` bigint unsigned default '0', `data_length` bigint unsigned default '16384', `max_data_length` bigint unsigned default '0', `index_length` bigint unsigned default '16384', `data_free` bigint unsigned default '0', `auto_increment` bigint unsigned default '1', `create_time` timestamp not null default current_timestamp, `update_time` timestamp not null default current_timestamp on update current_timestamp, `check_time` timestamp default current_timestamp, `table_collation` varchar(32) default null, `checksum` bigint unsigned default null, `create_options` varchar(255) default null, `table_comment` varchar(2048) default null, `status` int not null default '0' comment '0:ABSENT,1:PUBLIC', `flag` bigint unsigned default '0', primary key (`id`), unique key (`table_schema`, `table_name`), key (`table_name`) ) charset=utf8

SystemTable.name: tables_ext
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists `tables_ext` ( `id` bigint unsigned not null auto_increment, `table_catalog` varchar(512) default 'def', `table_schema` varchar(64) not null, `table_name` varchar(64) not null, `new_table_name` varchar(64) default null, `table_type` int not null default '0' comment '0:SINGLE,1:SHARDING,2:BROADCAST,3:GSI', `db_partition_key` varchar(512) default null, `db_partition_policy` varchar(64) default null, `db_partition_count` int unsigned not null default '1', `db_name_pattern` varchar(256) not null, `db_rule` varchar(512) default null, `db_meta_map` mediumtext default null, `tb_partition_key` varchar(512) default null, `tb_partition_policy` varchar(64) default null, `tb_partition_count` int unsigned not null default '1', `tb_name_pattern` varchar(256) not null, `tb_rule` varchar(512) default null, `tb_meta_map` mediumtext default null, `ext_partitions` mediumtext default null, `full_table_scan` int unsigned not null default '0', `broadcast` int unsigned not null default '0', `version` bigint unsigned not null default '1', `status` int not null default '0' comment '0:ABSENT,1:PUBLIC', `flag` bigint unsigned default '0', primary key (`id`), unique key (`table_schema`, `table_name`) ) charset=utf8

SystemTable.name: table_partitions
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists `table_partitions` ( `id` bigint not null auto_increment, `parent_id` bigint not null comment '>0:has parent; <=0:has no parent', `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `update_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `table_schema` varchar(64) not null, `table_name` varchar(64) not null, `sp_temp_flag` int not null comment '1:sub part is defined by template,0:defined by non-template', `group_id` bigint not null default -1 comment 'part_level = 0 ref to tableGroupId, next_level = -1 ref to partition group', `meta_version` bigint unsigned not null default '1', `auto_flag` int default 0 comment '0:auto rebalancing is not open, 1: auto rebalancing is open', `tbl_type` int default 0 comment '0:primary table, 1:gsi table', `part_name` varchar(64) not null default '' comment 'the name of part', `part_temp_name` varchar(64) null comment 'part name in template', `part_level` int not null comment '-1:no_next_level,0:logical,1:1st_level_part,2:2nd_level_part,3:3rd_level_part', `next_level` int not null comment '-1:no_next_level,0:logical,1:1st_level_part,2:2nd_level_part,3:3rd_level_part', `part_status` int not null, `part_position` bigint default null, `part_method` varchar(64) default null, `part_expr` longtext default null, `part_desc` longtext default null, `part_comment` longtext default null, `part_engine` varchar(64) default null, `part_extras` longtext default null, `part_flags` bigint unsigned default '0', `phy_table` varchar(64) default null, primary key (`id`), unique key `uk_pname`(`table_schema`,`table_name`,`part_name`), key `tb_level`(`table_schema`,`table_name`,`part_level`), key `grp_id`(`group_id`), key `par_id`(`parent_id`) ) charset=utf8

SystemTable.name: table_partitions_delta
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists `table_partitions_delta` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `parent_id` bigint not null comment '>0:has parent; <=0:has no parent', `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `update_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `table_schema` varchar(64) not null, `table_name` varchar(64) not null, `sp_temp_flag` int not null comment '1:sub part is defined by template,0:defined by non-template', `group_id` bigint not null default -1 comment 'part_level = 0 ref to tableGroupId, next_level = -1 ref to partition group', `meta_version` bigint unsigned not null default '1', `auto_flag` int default 0 comment '0:auto rebalancing is not open, 1: auto rebalancing is open', `tbl_type` int default 0 comment '0:primary table, 1:gsi table', `part_name` varchar(64) not null default '' comment 'the name of part', `part_temp_name` varchar(64) null comment 'part name in template', `part_level` int not null comment '-1:no_next_level,0:logical,1:1st_level_part,2:2nd_level_part,3:3rd_level_part', `next_level` int not null comment '-1:no_next_level,0:logical,1:1st_level_part,2:2nd_level_part,3:3rd_level_part', `part_status` int not null, `part_position` bigint default null, `part_method` varchar(64) default null, `part_expr` longtext default null, `part_desc` longtext default null, `part_comment` longtext default null, `part_engine` varchar(64) default null, `part_extras` longtext default null, `part_flags` bigint unsigned default '0', `phy_table` varchar(64) default null, PRIMARY KEY (`table_schema`,`table_name`,`part_name`) ) charset=utf8

SystemTable.name: views
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists `views` ( `id` bigint unsigned not null auto_increment, `catalog_name` varchar(512) default 'def', `schema_name` varchar(64) not null, `view_name` varchar(64) not null, `column_list` mediumtext default null, `view_definition` longtext not null, `plan` longtext default null, `plan_type` varchar(255) default null, `plan_error` longtext, `materialization` varchar(255) default null, `check_option` varchar(8) default null, `is_updatable` varchar(3) default null, `definer` varchar(93) default null, `security_type` varchar(7) default null, `character_set_client` varchar(32) default null, `collation_connection` varchar(32) default null, `gmt_modified` timestamp not null default current_timestamp on update current_timestamp, `gmt_created` timestamp not null default current_timestamp, `extend_field` longtext comment 'Json string extend field', primary key (`id`), unique key (`schema_name`, `view_name`) ) charset=utf8

SystemTable.name: columns
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists `columns` ( `id` bigint unsigned not null auto_increment, `table_catalog` varchar(512) default 'def', `table_schema` varchar(64) not null, `table_name` varchar(64) not null, `column_name` varchar(64) not null, `ordinal_position` bigint unsigned not null default '0', `column_default` longtext, `is_nullable` varchar(3) not null, `data_type` varchar(64) not null, `character_maximum_length` bigint unsigned default null, `character_octet_length` bigint unsigned default null, `numeric_precision` bigint unsigned default null, `numeric_scale` bigint unsigned default null, `datetime_precision` bigint unsigned default null, `character_set_name` varchar(32) default null, `collation_name` varchar(32) default null, `column_type` longtext not null, `column_key` varchar(3) default null, `extra` varchar(60) default null, `privileges` varchar(80) default null, `column_comment` varchar(1024) default null, `generation_expression` longtext not null, `jdbc_type` int not null, `jdbc_type_name` varchar(64) not null, `field_length` bigint not null default '0', `version` bigint unsigned not null default '1', `status` int not null default '0' comment '0:ABSENT,1:PUBLIC', `flag` bigint unsigned default '0', primary key (`id`), unique key (`table_schema`, `table_name`, `column_name`), key (`table_name`) ) charset=utf8
SystemTable.Change: alter table `columns` modify column `extra` varchar(60) default null

SystemTable.name: indexes
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists `indexes` ( `id` bigint unsigned not null auto_increment, `table_catalog` varchar(512) default 'def', `table_schema` varchar(64) not null, `table_name` varchar(64) not null, `non_unique` bigint(1) not null default '0', `index_schema` varchar(64) not null, `index_name` varchar(64) not null, `seq_in_index` bigint(10) not null default '0', `column_name` varchar(64) not null, `collation` varchar(3) default null, `cardinality` bigint default null, `sub_part` bigint(3) default null, `packed` varchar(10) default null, `nullable` varchar(3) default null, `index_type` varchar(16) default null comment 'BTREE, FULLTEXT, HASH, RTREE, GLOBAL', `comment` varchar(16) default null comment 'INDEX, COVERING', `index_comment` varchar(1024) default null, `index_column_type` bigint(10) default '0' comment '0:INDEX,1:COVERING', `index_location` bigint(10) not null default '0' comment '0:LOCAL,1:GLOBAL', `index_table_name` varchar(64) default null, `index_status` bigint(10) not null default '0' comment '0:CREATING,1:DELETE_ONLY,2:WRITE_ONLY,3:WRITE_REORG,4:PUBLIC,5:DELETE_REORG,6:REMOVING,7:ABSENT', `version` bigint not null default '1', `flag` bigint unsigned default '0', primary key (`id`), unique key (`table_schema`, `table_name`, `index_name`, `column_name`), key `i_index_name_version` (`index_name`, `version`), key (`table_name`) ) charset=utf8

SystemTable.name: locality_info
SystemTable.Create:
CREATE TABLE LOCALITY_INFO ( `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `gmt_created` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `gmt_modified` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `object_type` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '0:default, 1:database, 2:tablegroup, 3:partitiongroup', `object_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT 'id of the locality object', `primary_zone` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'primary zone of the object', `locality` text NOT NULL COMMENT 'locality of the object',
PRIMARY KEY(`id`), UNIQUE KEY(`object_type`, `object_id`) ) CHARSET=utf8;

SystemTable.name: files
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists `files` ( `file_id` bigint auto_increment, `file_name` varchar(4000) default null, `file_type` varchar(20) not null default '', `file_meta` longblob default null, `tablespace_name` varchar(64) default null, `table_catalog` varchar(64) not null default '', `table_schema` varchar(64) default null, `table_name` varchar(64) default null, `logfile_group_name` varchar(64) default null, `logfile_group_number` bigint(4) default null, `engine` varchar(64) not null default '', `fulltext_keys` varchar(64) default null, `deleted_rows` bigint(4) default null, `update_count` bigint(4) default null, `free_extents` bigint(4) default null, `total_extents` bigint(4) default null, `extent_size` bigint(4) not null default '0', `initial_size` bigint(21) unsigned default null, `maximum_size` bigint(21) unsigned default null, `autoextend_size` bigint(21) unsigned default null, `creation_time` datetime default null, `last_update_time` datetime default null, `last_access_time` datetime default null, `recover_time` bigint(4) default null, `transaction_counter` bigint(4) default null, `version` bigint(21) unsigned default null, `row_format` varchar(10) default null, `table_rows` bigint(21) unsigned default null, `avg_row_length` bigint(21) unsigned default null, `data_length` bigint(21) unsigned default null, `max_data_length` bigint(21) unsigned default null, `index_length` bigint(21) unsigned default null, `data_free` bigint(21) unsigned default null, `create_time` datetime default current_timestamp, `update_time` datetime default current_timestamp on update current_timestamp, `check_time` datetime default null, `checksum` bigint(21) unsigned default null, `status` varchar(20) not null default '', `extra` varchar(255) default null, `task_id` bigint(21) unsigned not null, `life_cycle` bigint(21) unsigned not null comment '0: creating, 1: ready, 2: deleted', `local_path` varchar(4000) default null comment 'local path of orc file', `logical_schema_name` varchar(255) not null, `logical_table_name` varchar(255) not null, `commit_ts` bigint(21) unsigned default null, `remove_ts` bigint(21) unsigned default null, `file_hash` bigint(21) default null, `local_partition_name` varchar(255) default null, key `table_index`(`table_schema`, `table_name`), key `task_id` (`task_id`), KEY `file_name`(`file_name`(255)), KEY `logical_name`(`logical_schema_name`,`logical_table_name`), primary key (`file_id`) ) charset=utf8
SystemTable.Change: alter table `files` add column `file_hash` bigint(21) default null
alter table `files` add column `local_partition_name` varchar(255) default null

SystemTable.name: table_local_partitions
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists `table_local_partitions` ( `id` bigint not null primary key auto_increment, `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `update_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `table_schema` varchar(64) not null, `table_name` varchar(64) not null, `column_name` varchar(256) not null, `start_with_date` varchar(256), `interval_count` int not null, `interval_unit` CHAR(36) not null, `expire_after_count` int not null comment '-1:wont expire', `pre_allocate_count` int not null, `pivot_date_expr` varchar(512) not null, `archive_table_name` varchar(255) default null, `archive_table_schema` varchar(255) default null, unique key `uk_scheme_table`(`table_schema`,`table_name`) ) charset=utf8
SystemTable.Change: alter table `table_local_partitions` add column `archive_table_name` varchar(255) default null
alter table `table_local_partitions` add column `archive_table_schema` varchar(255) default null

SystemTable.name: column_metas
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists `column_metas` ( `column_meta_id` bigint auto_increment, `table_file_name` varchar(1000) not null, `table_schema` varchar(255) not null, `table_name` varchar(255) not null, `stripe_index` bigint not null, `stripe_offset` bigint not null, `stripe_length` bigint not null, `column_name` varchar(255) not null, `column_index` bigint not null, `bloom_filter_path` varchar(255) not null, `bloom_filter_offset` bigint, `bloom_filter_length` bigint, `is_merged` bigint not null default 0 comment '1: column index data merged in one file', `create_time` datetime default current_timestamp, `update_time` datetime default current_timestamp on update current_timestamp, `task_id` bigint unsigned not null, `life_cycle` bigint(21) unsigned not null comment '0: creating, 1: ready, 2: deleted', `engine` varchar(50) default 'OSS', `logical_schema_name` varchar(255) not null, `logical_table_name` varchar(255) not null, key `table_index`(`table_schema`, `table_name`), key `task_id` (`task_id`), key `column_meta_index`(`table_file_name`, `column_index`, `stripe_index`), primary key (`column_meta_id`) ) charset=utf8
SystemTable.Change: alter table `column_metas` add column `is_merged` bigint not null default 0 comment '1: column index data merged in one file'

SystemTable.name: scheduled_jobs
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists `scheduled_jobs` ( `schedule_id` bigint not null primary key auto_increment, `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `update_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `table_schema` varchar(64) not null, `table_name` varchar(64), `schedule_name` varchar(255) not null, `schedule_comment` varchar(512), `executor_type` varchar(64) not null, `schedule_context` longtext, `executor_contents` longtext, `status` varchar(64) not null comment 'ENABLED/DISABLED', `schedule_type` varchar(64) not null comment 'INTERVAL/CRON', `schedule_expr` varchar(256), `time_zone` varchar(64) not null, `last_fire_time` bigint not null default 0, `next_fire_time` bigint not null default 0, `starts` bigint not null default 0, `ends` bigint not null default 0, `schedule_policy` varchar(256) comment 'fire/wait/skip', `table_group_name` varchar(64), UNIQUE KEY(`table_schema`, `schedule_name`), KEY (`table_schema`, `table_name`), KEY(`next_fire_time`) ) charset=utf8

SystemTable.name: fired_scheduled_jobs
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists `fired_scheduled_jobs` ( `schedule_id` bigint not null, `table_schema` varchar(64) not null, `table_name` varchar(64), `fire_time` bigint not null default 0, `start_time` bigint not null default 0, `finish_time` bigint not null default 0, `state` varchar(64) not null comment 'QUEUED/RUNNING/SUCCESS/FAILED/SKIPPED', `remark` text, `result` longtext, `gmt_modified` timestamp not null default current_timestamp on update current_timestamp, `table_group_name` varchar(64), primary key(`schedule_id`, `fire_time`), KEY (`table_schema`, `table_name`), KEY (`fire_time`) ) charset=utf8
SystemTable.Change: alter table `fired_scheduled_jobs` add column `gmt_modified` timestamp not null default current_timestamp on update current_timestamp

SystemTable.name: file_storage_info
SystemTable.Create: CREATE TABLE `file_storage_info` ( `id` bigint(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `inst_id` varchar(128) NOT NULL COMMENT 'polardb-x instance id', `engine` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT 'engine name', `external_endpoint` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '外网访问', `internal_classic_endpoint` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT 'ECS 的经典网络访问（内网）', `internal_vpc_endpoint` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT 'ECS 的 VPC 网络访问（内网）', `file_uri` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `file_system_conf` text, `access_key_id` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `access_key_secret` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `priority` bigint(11) NOT NULL COMMENT 'the record with the max priority will be chosen to be engine s uri', `region_id` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `azone_id` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `cache_policy` bigint(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 3 COMMENT 'NO_CACHE(0), META_CACHE(1), DATA_CACHE(2), META_AND_DATA_CACHE(3)', `delete_policy` bigint(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 COMMENT '0 for never, 1 for master only, 2 for master and slave', `status` bigint(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 COMMENT '0 for disable, 1 for running, 2 for read only', `gmt_created` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `gmt_modified` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `endpoint_ordinal` bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '0 use external_endpoint, 1 use internal_classic_endpoint, 2 use internal_vpc_endpoint', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `file_uri` (`file_uri`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
SystemTable.Change: alter table `file_storage_info` add column `delete_policy` bigint(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 COMMENT '0 for never, 1 for master only, 2 for master and slave'
alter table `file_storage_info` add column `status` bigint(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 COMMENT '0 for disable, 1 for running, 2 for read only'
alter table `file_storage_info` add column `endpoint_ordinal` bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '0 use external_endpoint, 1 use internal_classic_endpoint, 2 use internal_vpc_endpoint'

SystemTable.name: file_storage_files_meta
SystemTable.Create: CREATE TABLE `file_storage_files_meta` ( `id` bigint(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `file_name` varchar(4000) not null, `engine` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT 'engine name', `commit_ts` bigint(21) unsigned default null, `remove_ts` bigint(21) unsigned default null, KEY `idx_commit_ts`(`commit_ts`), KEY `idx_remove_ts`(`remove_ts`), KEY `file_name`(`file_name`(255)), PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

SystemTable.name: partitions_heatmap
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists `partitions_heatmap` ( `id` bigint unsigned not null primary key auto_increment, `layer_num` tinyint unsigned not null, `timestamp` bigint unsigned not null, `axis` TEXT, KEY (`layer_num`, `timestamp`) ) charset=utf8
